question_sentence: Which Conservative leadership contender was eliminated from the race this week?
evidence: James Cleverly, who was formerly the favourite to replace Rishi Sunak as leader, was unexpectedly eliminated from the Conservative leadership race this week, after receiving only 37 votes in a ballot of Tory MPs. He was behind Kemi Badenoch, who won 42 votes, and Robert Jenrick, with 41.

question_sentence: Which sporting father and son made history by playing together for their NBA team?
evidence:
LeBron and Bronny James

LeBron James and his son LeBron Jr, also known as Bronny, made NBA history by playing together for the first time in Los Angeles Lakers' pre-season game against the Phoenix Suns. LeBron called it an unforgettable moment.

question_sentence: How many hours a year do tea drinkers allegedly spend away from their desks making a brew?
evidence: According to a study by retailer Haypp, workers made an average of three 15-minute trips to the kitchen each day, adding up to eight days over 12 months.

question_sentence: In Bob Woodward's upcoming book "War", what did Donald Trump allegedly send to Vladimir Putin at the beginning of the pandemic?
evidence: Bob Woodward claimed that Donald Trump communicated with Vladimir Putin multiple times after leaving office and sent him Covid-19 testing machines early in the pandemic. According to Woodward, it was Putin's suggestion to keep the gift a secret. In response, Trump called Woodward a bad "storyteller".

question_sentence: Labour announced it is considering what reform to the House of Lords this week, as part of broader measures?
choices: Appointments to the Lords will have to be publicly justified
Replacing the House of Lords with an elected chamber immediately
evidence: The proposal aims to curb the practice of rewarding party donors and advisers with seats in the upper chamber, after a number of controversial appointments under the last Conservative government.

question_sentence: For what reason have more than a dozen US states sued TikTok?
evidence: The lawsuit claims that the app is addictive and detrimental to children's mental health, accusing TikTok of ensnaring young users with features such as push notifications, endless scrolling and beauty filters that promote unhealthy body images, anxiety and depression.

question_sentence: Which major tennis tournament will become the latest to switch from human line judges to an all-electronic system?
evidence: After 147 years of using human line judges, Wimbledon will switch to using an all-electronic line-calling system from next year. It follows the Australian Open and US Open, with the French Open remaining the only Grand Slam tournament still relying on the human eye.

question_sentence: According to the latest Living Planet Index, what was the primary cause of the decline in wildlife populations?
evidence: Wildlife populations worldwide experienced an alarming average decline of 73% between 1970 and 2020, primarily due to human activities like farming and pollution.

question_sentence: Where will the first herd of tauros in Britain be released?
evidence: The first herd of tauros, which closely resemble a now extinct breed of cattle called aurochs, will be released on the Dundreggan estate near Loch Ness, as part of efforts to restore landscapes and boost biodiversity in the Scottish Highlands.

question_sentence: Which US state was the first of seven key battleground states to start early voting for the 2024 election?
evidence: Early voting began in Arizona on Wednesday. Vice-presidential nominees Tim Walz and J.D. Vance campaigned in the state, urging supporters to vote early as Arizona remains a crucial state with no clear favourite.

question_sentence: How many applications did the Office of the Marijuana Commissioner receive for marijuana business licenses in Delaware between August 19 and September 30, 2024?
In which event did Steve Gregg win a silver medal at the 1976 Montreal Olympics?
What is the primary goal of the newly formed Public Education Funding Commission in Delaware?
choices: To implement a weighted student funding formula

question_sentence: Which town was ranked as the wealthiest area in Delaware according to the recent report?
Why does Delaware rarely get hit by major hurricanes?
choices: The presence of protective mountain ranges
The state’s advanced hurricane defense systems

question_sentence: What inspired Andrea and Ryan Maloney to open the first Clean Eatz in Delaware?
Which restaurant in Sussex County had the most health and food safety guideline violations in the past 30 days as of October 7, 2024?
What is the main reason for the new coach bus service from the Wilmington airport to the Philadelphia airport?
choices: Avoiding heavy traffic and long security lines

question_sentence: What was the cause of Johnny Neel’s death?
What is the primary threat to the Bethany Beach firefly’s habitat?
